name: QR CODE For Saudi Arabia Zakat - ZATCA
title: QR CODE For Saudi Arabia Zakat - ZATCA
tool_name: QR CODE For Saudi Arabia Zakat - ZATCA

api_list.name: Get image
api_list.description:
after you request an image you can get it from this request

`https://qr-code-for-saudi-arabia-zakat-zatca1.p.rapidapi.com/qrcode/{hashSize}/{hashCode}/{imageName}?rapidapi-key={rapidapi-key}`
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-for-saudi-arabia-zakat-zatca1.p.rapidapi.com/qrcode/0.14985015/AQxDb21wYW55IG5hbWUCDzEyMzQ1Njc4F0XiRqlxteucqf2F0XiROTAxMjM0NQMTMjAwMi0xMi0xMiAxMjoxMjoxMgQDMTE1BQIxNQ==/Bill_ID.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-for-saudi-arabia-zakat-zatca1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-for-saudi-arabia-zakat-zatca1.p.rapidapi.com/qrcode/{hashsize}/{hashcode}/{imagename}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-for-saudi-arabia-zakat-zatca1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
